John Ward (American actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Ward_(American_actor) 0 John Ward (June 11, 1923 – March 23, 1995) was an American actor. Ward was born in Los Angeles, California and was best known for such films and television series as PT 109, Baretta and The FBI. John_Ward ( June_11_,_1923 – March_23_,_1995 ) was an_American_actor . Ward was_born in Los_Angeles , California and was_best_known for such_films_and_television_series as PT_109 , Baretta and The_FBI .
